properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, INTEREST ) VALUES( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )

UPDATE MEMBER SET PHONE =?, EMAIL = ?, ADDRESS = ?, INTEREST = ?, MODIFY_DATE = SYDATE, WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
